column3: Latest;Ratanakiri:------ According to the Ministry of Interior said on December 31
column6: a man was shot by a homemade weapon in Boeung Kanseng
column10: a 18-year-old ethnic Kreung resident was shot when he stopped his motorcycle near the south of Boeung Kanseng.------After the incident
column11: the victim was sent to the emergency ward in the province’s hospital where a metal ball-bearing bullet was removed from his  thigh. Banlung police are investigating. ------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/400486
